analysis.description:
Reentrancy in BankrollLending.addDeposit (/unique_chucks/8/0xf7a542a7f61d6479e8c63b8c43943df32262d71d.sol#220-238):
	External calls:
	- assert(bool)(token.transferFrom(to,address(this),value)) (/unique_chucks/8/0xf7a542a7f61d6479e8c63b8c43943df32262d71d.sol#234)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- stakes (/unique_chucks/8/0xf7a542a7f61d6479e8c63b8c43943df32262d71d.sol#237)

	- assert(bool)(newTotalStakes < tokenBalance()) (/unique_chucks/8/0xf7a542a7f61d6479e8c63b8c43943df32262d71d.sol#214)
	State variables written after the call(s):
